DOC.criteria: Individuals eligible participate base follow criterion : 1. cancer diagnosis 2. age 18 old 3. clinically significant cancerrelated fatigue ( CRF ) persist previous 8 week longer . Clinically significant CRF define cutoff mean score ≥ 4 across 3item Fatigue Symptom Inventory severity composite . Participants exclude base follow criterion : 1. chemotherapy , biologic response modifier , radiation therapy , surgery prior 3 month 2. enrollment hospice care 3. severe hear impairment 4. severe depression ( PHQ8 ≥ 15 ) 5. past participation mindfulness meditation class 6. incapable read write English .
